questions.question:
Answer the questions given below (refer Fig.2):


Fig. 2. Circuit configuration of AC voltage controller.


1. What will be the effect on output voltage (rms) on increasing the firing angle from 0° to 180°:

answers.c: Output voltage will increase upto 90° then starts decreasing.
answers.d: Output voltage will decrease upto 90° then starts increasing.

questions.question: 2. An 180 V, 50 Hz supply voltage is given to an AC voltage controller. What will be the power factor If the firing angle is 60o?
3. An 180 V, 50 Hz supply voltage is given to an AC voltage controller with resistive load of 100 ohms. What will be the rms current through SCR if the firing angle is 60°?
4. If firing angle is 60°, and extinction angle is 210° what will be the conduction angle?
5. What will be the effect on output voltage if both the thyristors are replaced by diodes?

answers.b: Output voltage will be half of the input voltage
answers.c: Output voltage will be equal to input voltage
answers.d: Output voltage will be double of input voltage
